extendedInfo.description: Lullabies are sung by mothers around the world for their children fall asleep. Your baby can not sleep, cries a lot, why do not you put a lullaby? You can put a nice sound to calm your baby and sleep like an angel. A beautiful song that will really calm your baby. â You can choose weather you want to hear the sound.â Great quality of the sound â Absolutely Relaxing!â The best relaxing sound!A lullaby is a soothing song, usually sung to young children before they go to sleep, with the intention of speeding that process. As a result they are often simple and repetitive. Lullabies can be found in every culture and since the ancient period.Typically a lullaby is in triple metre, or in a compound metre like 6/8. Tonally, most lullabies are simple, often merely alternating tonic and dominant harmonies: Because the intended effect is to put someone to sleep, wild chromaticism would be somewhat out of character.All persons are invited to help promote this application for (friends, colleagues, mother, father, grandmother, grandfather, brother, sister). For those who want to help indicate this application follows some examples of media (email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, MSN, YouTube, radio, TV, newspaper, book, magazine, Internet)Keywords: babies, children, preschool, children, sound effects, sounds, kids, alphabet for kids, preschool, sleep, baby,  music for babies, Happy Baby.

reviews.title: Love this app!!!
reviews.comment: First song creates a relaxing atmosphere for my there girls ages 3, 2 &1. I scheduled them to sleep @ 8pm. This awesome app helps me put them to sleep easily. Thank you!!!
reviews.author: Leps Mafua

reviews.title: Peace of mind
reviews.comment: Would b better if add more harmenys to it but other than that well done beautifull for my daughters ears at boo bo  time

reviews.title: very good
reviews.comment: mother n bb enjoy the music. calm n soothing, thank u!

reviews.title: Oh please!
reviews.comment: 3 midi tunes with a background. Oh and don\'t forget the ads! Not worth the download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t install
reviews.comment: It has weird background noises and turns off often. Plus just three song choices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love it
reviews.comment: I love this app. the fact it can play for long times is amazing.. and my 9 month old son likes it. he falls a sleep faster and I use it when im out and about to..

reviews.title: Cuts out
reviews.comment: My son loves the first song but sometimes it randomly cuts out which is annoying

reviews.title: Relaxing for any age
reviews.comment: I also downloaded nature sound and played at the same time.on my android Max and is really relaxing.

reviews.comment: Love this app. Its perfect for when your Brestfeeding because of the time increments you can choose :)

reviews.comment: Gud...3 year old fell asleep quiccer than 10 month old.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Love it!!! its a big break for me everyday..I just turn it on for my 3 month old and he falls right to sleep..
reviews.author: Jose Galeana

reviews.title: Works every time!
reviews.comment: This app is so awesome... Every time I play it, no matter what time of day or night it is, it puts him right to sleep in less than 5 minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its Alright could be better
reviews.comment: I really like , but all the  glitches I don\'t. It shuts off randomly. I set it for 4 hrs or something but it shuts off whenever it feels like  shutting off. Can u please.fix it? My boys really like it.
reviews.author: Vanessa Cook

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I use to work nights a lot so I got us to staying up but now that I\'m a full time college student and work only during the day I need to sleep at this app has made its so much easier I use to lay in bed for house trying to fall asleep but never could once I downloaded the app and started playing the music it took only minute for me to fall asleep and its been that way ever since I love this app :)
reviews.author: Krystal Burbridge

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Using app w my two month old and works well. Wish it had more than 3 tunes...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Life saver.
reviews.comment: I was baby sitting and the baby wouldn\'t go to sleep put music on quickly. Baby knocked out ;3 My life saver.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It use to take me hours to get my 2 yr old to go to bed, now all I do it turn the music on and she is out of it in 15 minutes! Wonderful! Thank you for creating it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: My baby is teething at the mo and a little crabby.this is  perfect for soothing him to sleep highly recommended thankyou
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lil one fell asleep in 30 min....I just had to hold myself back from picking him up...I dozed off when I woke up it was totally silent...I laughed and said to myself \" it actually worked\"
reviews.author: Patricia Elizalde

reviews.title: Keeps cutting off!
reviews.comment: Second song is too upbeat daughter actually started dancing instead of goin to sleep. First song does the job but keeps cutting off right when shes drifting off.. anywhere from 2-5 mins into it then she pops her head up and i have to start all over.. fail!
reviews.author: A Google User
